course.subject: MECH
course.name: Fundamentals of Aeronautical Engineering - Thermodynamics
course.description: This course teaches fundamental knowledge in Thermodynamics. Topics include basic concepts of heat transfer; pure substance; work and heat; control volume; Ideal and real gases; first and second laws of thermodynamics; entropy; elementary power. This course is intended for students without relevant background but who want to enroll to the Minor Program of Aeronautical Engineering. Instructor's approval is required for enrollment in the course.
